flight_system
Class Flight

java.lang.Object
  flight_system.Flight
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Flight>
public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Flight>

Class used to represent a flight. Contains information about the Origin Airport and final Airport, flight times, lay over durations, and flight durations.

A flight is a list of flight legs.

Author:
Zhong Ren
See Also:
FlightLeg

getDepartureTime

public Time getDepartureTime(int indexOfLeg)
Get a departure time of specific flight leg.

If the leg does not exist, it returns 00:00 GMT.

Parameters:
indexOfLeg - the index of the flight leg
Returns:
the departure time of specific flight leg

getArrivalTime

public Time getArrivalTime()
Gets the arrival time at the final destination.

Note that the times are in GMT.

Returns:
the arrival time at the final destination.
